RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Professora de italiano no Istituto Italiano di Cultura do Rio de Janeiro desde 1997. Possui graduaзгo em LETRAS - UNIVERSITА DEGLI STUDI LA SAPIENZA (Roma, 1994), Mestrado em LETRAS NEOLATINAS (UFRJ,2012) e Doutorado em LETRAS NEOLATINAS com o prof. Andrea Lombardi (UFRJ, 2017). Bolsista CNPq atй 2014- bolsista PDSE CAPES em 2015. Atualmente й pesquisadora de Pуs-Doutorado com Bolsa Faperj-nota 10, supervisor: prof. Roberto Acнzelo (UERJ).
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Bachelor's at LETRAS from UNIVERSITА DEGLI STUDI LA SAPIENZA of Rome (Italy,1994). Master in Italian Literature, UFRJ (Rio de Janeiro, 2012)

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O labуratуrio ESTTRADA (Estudos de traduзгo e adaptaзгo) nasceu na UFRJ em 17 de marзo de 2014, efeito de de uma atividade desenvolvida ao longo do ano de 2013 pelo grupo de traduзгo da Faculdade de Letras. Ao longo dos primeiros dois anos de atividade (2014/2016) foram realizados diversos eventos e pesquisas: Curso de extensгo e mesa-redonda "A traduзгo nгo й uma уpera" , de Valerio Magrelli Curso "Traduзгo e intertextualidade" Curso e mesa-redonda "Literatura, Йtica e Traduзгo" Bloomsday Lнnguas da Itбlia - Le parlate d'Italia, com Anita Mosca e Alessandra Vannucci I Jornada do ESTTRADA - A traduзгo na Amйrica Latina O Brasil de todas as lнnguas - Andar na terra como um pбssaro voa no cйu A traduзгo em movimento, com Andreia Guerini

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: ?Uno strano paese?. Oscillazioni identitarie dell ́italianitа nella letteratura di testimonianza
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: 'A strange country'. Identity oscillations of Italianness in the testimony literature.

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: AATI - Cagliari International Conference

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Abstract: Primo Levi's work presents various narrative themes, among which we propose the question of the oscillation of "Italianness", within the discourse on foreigners and strangers. The deportation (If this is a man), the return journey (The truce), the narrative of the Russian-Jewish resistance (If not now, when?), and numerous short stories offer peculiar observation points for the description of cultural shock and interactions between Italians and populations of every part of Europe (and not only), where some differences stand out: between the Mediterranean and Nordic world or between assimilated Italian Jews and Yiddish-speaking Jews. Above all, crossing frontiers and the meeting with the others allow a continuous redefinition of the national identity. Levi experiences the extreme exile in Auschwitz, in a desert landscape, in a Babel where the Italians were the first to succumb because of communication difficulties. Expelled from the racial laws by the definition of "foreigner", Levi can not on the other hand identify with the Jews of Eastern Europe. His reference remains Italy and the italian language. Remembering the poetry of his literary mentor , Dante Alighieri, he can maintain the link with a language that becomes the only Heimat possible in the concentration camp. In addition to lost and then newly reached land, Italy also becomes a landing place for the thousands of refugees before and after the war, whose story generates other visions, estranged, marveled, surprised by paradoxes and contradictions of this diferent country, Discoveries, identity redefinitions, overcoming stereotypes, irony: all these aspects follow one another in what Alberto Cavaglion has also defined "the long transversal essay of national characteristics".
Key-words: identity, Italian, Primo Levi, foreigner
